name: Introduction to C Programming
details: Learn the fundamentals of C programming, including variables, data types, control structures, and functions. Start building your coding skills.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore the world of algorithms, data structures, and algorithmic problem-solving techniques. Dive into sorting, searching, and optimization algorithms.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Master C++ programming and its applications in Data Structures and Algorithms. Learn about pointers, linked lists, trees, and more.

name: Basic Data Structures
details: Get a deep understanding of fundamental data structures like arrays, stacks, queues, and linked lists. Learn how to implement and when to use.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Explore Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles using Python. Learn how to create classes, objects, and build modular and reusable code.

name: Software Engineering
details: Gain insights into the software development lifecycle, requirements analysis, design patterns, and best practices in software engineering.

name: AWS Cloud Computing
details: Discover Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud computing services, including EC2, S3, and Lambda. Learn to deploy scalable and cost-effective solutions.

name: Database (MySQL)
details: Master the MySQL database management system, from database design and querying to transactions and optimization.

name: Problem-Solving Part
details: Enhance your problem-solving skills through coding challenges and real-world problem-solving techniques. Sharpen your coding and algorithmic.
